spec.description: OpenAPI specification source - URL, file path, or structured resolver config

oneOf.description: URL or file path to the OpenAPI specification
Stainless stats resolver - fetches stats.yml and extracts openapi_spec_url

statsUrl.description: URL to Stainless .stats.yml file containing openapi_spec_url

output.description: Output file path relative to the package directory

name.description: Name for the generated client (defaults to 'Client')

typeOnly.description: Generate type-only output without runtime code

header.description: Content to prepend to the generated file (e.g. module-level JSDoc)

patches.description: JSON Patch documents to apply to the spec before generation. Each item can be a file path or inline JSON array.

replacements.description: Text replacements to apply to generated code.

excludeAnnotations.description: Annotation keys to exclude from generated schema code (e.g. ["examples"]).
